346a7(mdo sde): ba sgrub/ / tshes gnyis la ni sa ri ste// chos gsum la ni sa ga yin// chos bzhi la ni lha 'tshams te// tshes lnga la ni snron yin no// tshes drug la ni snrubs yin te// chos
346b1(mdo sde): bdun la ni chu stod yin/ / tshes brgyad la ni chu smad yin// tshes dgur byi bzhin gro bzhin te// tshes bcu la ni man gru yin// chos bcu gcig la mon gre ste// chos bcu gnyis la
346b2(mdo sde): khrums stod yin/ / rjes bcu gsum la khrums smad yin// tshes bcu bzhi la na ma thu ste// zla rangs mtshangs tha skar yin// ston zla 'bring po'i ngol ni// lo skor bdag gis
346b3(mdo sde): brjod par bya/ / lho yi phyogs su kha ltas te// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// nyin par bcu drug 'gro byed cing // mtshan mo yang ni bcu bzhi yin// khrums stod kyis ni mtshan mo
346b4(mdo sde): 'thob/ / nyi ma'i mdun na nag pa yin// grib tshod dag ni gom bzhi ste// nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed// lha yi bla ma pa wa sangs// gza' ni zhing la rnam par gzhag/ 'dir
346b5(mdo sde): khyim srang zhes bya ba bzhag/ zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin// yongs su 'khor ba de yis ni// lo ni de ltar 'gro bar byed// mig stong yang dang yang du ni// 'dus te chos kyi phyogs
346b6(mdo sde): la ltos/ / khyod ni shes rab gzhi yin na// chos ma yin pa'ang zlog par gyis// chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// thos phyug mkhas pa bsam gtan pa// de dag khyod kyis
346b7(mdo sde): chos gos dang / / bza' btung rnams kyi rjes su bsrungs// yang dag gnas te brgya byin gyis// rnga bong la ni thab sbyar nas// rab tu smras pa bdag cag gi/ bya ba yang ni bsgo bar
347a1(mdo sde): gyis/ smras pa/ lha yi bla ma khyod kyis su// rtag par tshangs par spyod pa srungs// rig sngags spyan dang gsang sngags rnams// thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs//
347a2(mdo sde): las kun drang srong zla ba dang // zla ba chung dang zhag dang bzhi// bzo yi las kyi mtha' kun la// gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin// drag po drug gi sna can dang // dgon pa dang ni lci ba ste/
347a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni// mchod sbyin rib mar gtso bor bkod// rgya mtsho chu lha 'jog po dang // rin chen skyong dang ring du 'gro// sa yid tshes dang zla srung dang // gnas thar byed pa
347a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho ni/ / gtso bor bzhag ste ma dros dang // khab kyis lus 'bigs chu lhas byin// ri dwags 'khrug pa'ang klung de bzhin// klung rnams kyi ni gtso bor bkod// khyod ni dge ba
347a5(mdo sde): rab bskyed pa/ / ne co sa ni khyab byed pa// mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste// de 'dra ba ni ji lta bur// khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang // ma yi rtse mo'i gtso bo ste// khyod ni rlung dmar
347a6(mdo sde): 'gul g.yo ba/ / rlung ni yang pa'i gtso bo yin// rdo rje'i mig dang seng ge'i mig/ legs mthong lag na mdung gsum thogs// lha mo bzhi po de dag ni// grong khyer gtso bor bkod
347a7(mdo sde): pa yin/ / gong ma'i chags skyes rtsis mu khyud// 'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin bzhi// de dag rin chen brtag pa la// nyo tshong byed pa'i gtso bor bkod// phyogs mtshams su ni
347b1(mdo sde): bzhi yin te/ / srung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gnas// yul 'kho grong khyer thams du// srung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod// drang srong dag ni thams cad dang // lha yi tshogs dang klu rnama?//
347b2(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi// bar yang rjes su yi rang byed// lus brtan rab tu rgyal ba mchog/ thub pa yi ni gtso bo ste// khyod ni skye dang 'gag pa dang // zas dang ro dang me tog
347b3(mdo sde): mchog/ khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste// shu dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyod ni lam bde skyed pa ste/ rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis/
347b4(mdo sde): ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod// nor rgyas bu dang thang shing zhing // lci mchog mig dmar dmugs byed skyes// khyod ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso// khyod ni grub dang yid 'phrog pa// zla ba
347b5(mdo sde): bophog par byed pa ste/ / bcud kyis len gyi gtso bo yin// gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin// khyim rnams thams cad rnam par bzhag/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang ni// skal ldan rgyu ni
347b6(mdo sde): rnam par bzhag/ lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso// grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes po// klu rnams kyi ni spyan mi bzang // dri ze rnams kyi yul 'khor srung // thams cad kyi
347b7(mdo sde): gling chen po bzhi/ / gling gzhan brgyad khri thams cad du// drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongs su skyong ba ma bkod par btang ba'i gnas ci yang med do// der lha dang / klu dang / gnod
348a1(mdo sde): sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byas par
348a2(mdo sde): gyur te/ / drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjes su yi rangs par gyur te// bya ba de ni mchod pa dang / rim gror bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to// de'i rjes su shin tu yun
348a3(mdo sde): ring zhig na/ drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste/ des kyang skar ma'i dpyad rab tu byas so// zhag gis mi thub pa dang / shol yod par yang bshad do// yang de'i tshe drang srong
348a4(mdo sde): thub pa'i gnas rten ga la bder klu thams cad 'dus te/ / de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa skyes te/ de la mchod pa'i las bya
348a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ci nus su brtson par gyur to/ / // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las
348a6(mdo sde): skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par bzhag pa'i le'u rdzogs so/ / // 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde/ nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/
348a7(mdo sde): rgya mtshos smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni rgyu skar tshogs// ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni// khyod kyis sngon tshe tshe rabs dran// mkhas khyod srid gsum kun gyi gtso// khyod kyi snying rje byams
348b1(mdo sde): pa dper/ / shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin// kun dpal 'di nas khyod kyis ni// lag 'gro thams cad thar par gyis// srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod// lag 'gro
348b2(mdo sde): bde kun tshim byed khyod/ / khyod ni drang srong kun gyi bla// mi rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os// 'gro ba'i kun dpal khyod la ni// lha dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs// rten gyis yus rnam
348b3(mdo sde): thams cad pa/ / lag 'gro myur du thar par gyis// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu yid dang ba bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs
348b4(mdo sde): cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ / yon tan de 'dra ba dag la med// drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin// khyed cag 'di nas thar byed par//
348b5(mdo sde): bdag gis nus pa ma yin no// gang gis bskal pa du mar ni// dka' thub dka' ba bzod pa sprad// khyed cag thar par byed pa yi// drang srong gzhan de lta bar gyis// rtag tu
348b6(mdo sde): brtson zhing sbyin pa byin/ / mkhas shing glang chen rta dang ni// shing rta bu dang chung ma dang // nor gyis sems can phan pa byas// rkang lag mgo dang rna ba dang // mig dang lag
348b7(mdo sde): pa khrag dang ni/ / bu bran bran mo bza' btung mang // mal chakha zas sngon chad btang // snying rje dang ni byams pa yis// khyed cag thar byed srid gsum na// mtshungs med bsam
349a1(mdo sde): gtan dga' byung ba/ / de ni drang srong rnga bong ste// kun tu brtse zhes byang chub sems// sngon chang ri dgas pha rol phyin// sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyis/
349a2(mdo sde): nyam thag pa ni thar par byas// sems can gcig gi ched du yang // sngon gyi tshe rabs de bskal par// dmyal bar 'gro bzod des yi dgas// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas byung //
349a3(mdo sde): sems can sdug bsngal nyam thag kun// sdug bsngal thar mdzad rnga bong yin// sems can smin byed brtson 'grus dang // snying rje brtan pas de srid 'khor// rnga bong de ni
349a4(mdo sde): skyes pa na/ / rgyal sras bu ram shing pa yi// rigs su zas gtsang gi ni sras// des ni btsas ma thag tu khyab// srid gsum bde 'byung 'jig rten dpal// yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs
349a5(mdo sde): dang / lha dang klu yi sa rnams dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab// der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags// de yis gom pa bdun bor te// ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi//
349a6(mdo sde): sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur// 'gro ba rga nad sdug bsngal dang // 'chi bas gzir las ngas dgrol zhing // zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med// skam la dgod ces shA ka sras
349a7(mdo sde): gsungs/ / me tog dro dang rin chen dag/ lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing // 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis// sras lo la ni bstod gyur pa// bskal pa mang po du mar yang /
349b1(mdo sde): sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang // sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la bstan// sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod// 'di las skye ba 'di dang ni// thams cad kyi ni tha ma lags//
349b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par// ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya// des kyang dpa' bo bstan par gyur// mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs// drug khrim pa spangs nas su/
349b3(mdo sde): spyod pa rab brtan lo drug spyad// g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i// bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang // byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes// mya ngan med la don dam gzigs/
349b4(mdo sde): byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis// sems can kun dang mi mnyam zhing // 'byung po dag ni thams cad la// de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa// sems can gang la'ang 'tho mi 'tsham// /
349b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las// thar par mdzad cing de yang ni// rnam bcings btson ra thar mdzad pa// ma ga d+ha na de gnas shing // 'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston//
349b6(mdo sde): de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob// byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos// drang srong mchog gi thad du deng // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las// khyed cag yongs su thar par byed// rang nyid kyang
349b7(mdo sde): ni 'dong bar gyis/ / dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis// phyin chad mkha' lding thams cad las// 'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung ngo // rtag bde sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis// btsonar 'di na/
350a1(mdo sde): g.yo sgyu can// bdud ni khyed la rnam par 'tshe// ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin// thams cad kyang ni gzung bar bgyis// yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang klu chen po
350a2(mdo sde): dang ram dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ chos thams cad kyi
350a3(mdo sde): dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug balngal sel bar mdzad pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa/ dga' ba thams cad skyed par mdzad pa/ shes rab thams cad kyi
350a4(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa/ rtag tu byams pa'i blugs dang ldan pa/ thugs rje thams cad kyis khyab pa/ 'phrin las thams cad sgrubs par mdzad pa/ lam thams cad ston pa/ yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba/
350a5(mdo sde): lha dang klu rnams kyi mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa mchod pa thams cad 'os pa bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal zhing btson ra 'dir 'phangs lags na/
350a6(mdo sde): 'di nas bdag cag thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu de dag dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de gnas de nas 'gro
350a7(mdo sde): par ni ma nus so/ / de dag thams cad kyis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bden te/ sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i chos nyid yin no// de la bdag
350b1(mdo sde): cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so/ / 'di nas myur du bzhud cig/ bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar par mdzod cig/ skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can thams
350b2(mdo sde): cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang
350b3(mdo sde): chub kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir/ dang por ma byung ba la dmigs
350b4(mdo sde): pa dang / nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog bstan to// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams la rgyu las yang dag par byung ba dang /
350b5(mdo sde): so sor brtags pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to// da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na/ theg pa bla na med
350b6(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir dang / bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i phyir dang /
350b7(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ chos kyi khrus mdzad do// da lta shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa kun nas ldang ba med pa/
351a1(mdo sde): rgyu ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/ rnam par bzhag pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med
351a2(mdo sde): bar gsal byed med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'byung po chen po thams cad dang / mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i srid pa zhes bya
351a3(mdo sde): ba'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhim tshor ba med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'gag pa
351a4(mdo sde): med pa dang / de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang / gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dor dam pa stong pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba byed pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa
351a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa la dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongs su spang ba byas pa/ sems nam mkha' dang
351a6(mdo sde): mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa ston to//
351a7(mdo sde): kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas snyan pa 'di bshad pa na yang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po sus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba la gtsub pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal
351b1(mdo sde): po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas/ de dag snang ba dang / rnam par bsgying ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par//
351b2(mdo sde): gyur to// de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob
351b3(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// khyod bzhud la snying rje chen po thob pa gang gis/ 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongasu
351b4(mdo sde): thar pa bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thob pa de la/ bdag cag gi chog gsol ba thob cig/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la
351b5(mdo sde): dga' ba drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang / de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'o le'u bcu gcig pa las brgyad do// /
351b6(mdo sde): / bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabs su nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thob te/ shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la/ rgya shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus
351b7(mdo sde): rdul nas lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// lag 'gro skyabs ni skyabs su dong // skye dgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing // 'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa// mi bzang g.yo sgyu can la
352a1(mdo sde): ltos de'i tshe bdud kyi bu mo mun bral ma zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ / sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis// dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchi// gang dag de yi tshig thos shig/
352a2(mdo sde): de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal// brtson pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yin// khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs// bka' mchi de sna tshogs lhan cig mdzad// de yi sgyu ni ma bslabs sam// bdud kyis slar smras pa/
352a3(mdo sde): dge sbyong go'u ta ma brtan pa yin// rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste// stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs// brgal nas skye dgu sgrol bar byed// mun bral mas smras pa/ stong pa la ni gang zhugs pa// bdud
352a4(mdo sde): rnams bye bas mi bskyod de/ / byang grol bde ba sbyin bgyid pa// de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi// de bzhin nyid la gang brten cing // ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin// de la bdag ni skya blas/
352a5(mdo sde): su mchi// sgra de bdag gis bslab par bgyi// sems can thams cad rnam par grol// chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ bdud kyi bu mo lnga snyed bdud kyi gnas der 'khor
352a6(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur te/ bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dngang ste rmongs nas/ stobs kyi shugs kyi 'chag sar zhugs te/ bdud kyi stobs kyi shugs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyi rlabs pa de
352a7(mdo sde): lta bu byin gyis brlabs so/ / gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring po ma lon par/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas/ nam mkha' las rdo'i char pa me rab tu
352b1(mdo sde): 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te/ klu thams cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshog rab tu bab ste/ klu thams cad rab tu
352b2(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur to/ / dga' khyab mas smras pa/ kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyed ltos shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling der dge sbyong go'u ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dir sdug bsngal mang pos
352b3(mdo sde): gnod par byed na/ gang dag 'dir 'khor nas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dong ba/ rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas skyabs su sems can su
352b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba/ / bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te// tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang // de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro// ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing // byang chub smon lam brtan
352b5(mdo sde): po bskyed pas na/ / de ni bdud rnams du mas gsad mi nus// nem nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// de yi bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing // tshig gi don gcig tsam yang nyan byed na// byang chub phyir
352b6(mdo sde): ni sems kyang bskyed pa de/ / sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med// yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis// der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs// sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la
352b7(mdo sde): bsngos/ / der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur to// gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing // bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba// chung ngu lung bstan pa ni de nyan pa'i// rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas
353a1(mdo sde): gsungs/ / bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pur 'dug go/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'/
353a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar mjug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go// bcom
353a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
353a4(mdo sde): bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na/ lus kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal
353a5(mdo sde): gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas dgum pa la thug ste/ btson rar stsal nas/ zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing / bcing ba lngas bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa man+da ra ba'i bsung la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol
353a6(mdo sde): pa btab pa lags so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man+da ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shul kar bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa
353a7(mdo sde): de lta bus/ bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yings bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus brtson der bdag cag gi rnalam du don dang bcas/ cig 'bru dang bcas par grags so// gsang sngam/
353b1(mdo sde): yid la bgyid pa de dag gis bdag cag dga' ba dang dad pa yang dag par bskyed nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /
353b2(mdo sde): lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba
353b3(mdo sde): nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes 'gyi ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i 'du byed pas pa'i sgrib pa dang / bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi nang
353b4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i sgrib pa yongasu pas shing / der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyi mod la/ mgrin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol te/ btson ra
353b5(mdo sde): nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cing / de nas nam mkha' las chas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man+da ra ba'i gsung gi thad du nye bar phyin to// de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri bo'i
353b6(mdo sde): 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thang du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas/ sngan chad bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnams su bdag
353b7(mdo sde): cag ma skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / de bzhin du da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad/ sems can mi dang mi lags pa dpag tu ma mchis pas
354a1(mdo sde): khyab ste/ de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zin to zhes bgyi ba nas/ sangs rgyas
354a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su las yongs su ma dag pa dag gis bsgribs te mchi bar mi nus pa lags so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o/ / sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu/ sems
354a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi
354a4(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib pa mchis pa'i bar thams
354a5(mdo sde): cad dang / thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang / chos bstan pa des sems can rnams
354a6(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas/ sems can rnams ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/ bsams bzhin du
354a7(mdo sde): srid par skye ba len par rngo thogs par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par rgyun du brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang / log par mi
354b1(mdo sde): ltung ba'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang / bsam
354b2(mdo sde): gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
354b3(mdo sde): bar du chos de dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzung
354b4(mdo sde): sngags de legs par bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
354b5(mdo sde): stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can su la la theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa de ni myur du theg pa
354b6(mdo sde): de yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin la/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/ thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len tham
354b7(mdo sde): cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa yin/ bstan pa srung bar 'dod pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang / dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gzugs
355a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / stobs 'dod pa dang / 'khor 'dod pa dang / nor dang / 'bru 'dod pa dang / thu bo 'do ngapa dang / mi dang ma yin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod pa yin// rtag
355a2(mdo sde): lus 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis kun tu gnon par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon dag/
355a3(mdo sde): shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par 'dod pa yin no// de ltar yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas cher 'phongs pa rnam pa sna
355a4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsams bzhin du srid par sred pa blangs pa de'i bar gyis/ myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu
355a5(mdo sde): de dag bsgrub par mi nus te/ las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing / kha zas gtsang ma dang / mal gtsang ma de skyil mo krung ngam/ 'chag
355a6(mdo sde): pas kyang rung ste/ rjes su 'thun pa'i tshes brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs yid la byed pas/ gzhan yid la mi sems par zhes bya ba nas/ las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin pa'i
355a7(mdo sde): bar gyis/ re zhig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba nas/ mtshan bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na/ des rang gi sku byad du sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs chung
355b1(mdo sde): dur rtog par byed na/ chung ngur kho nar mthong ngo // yang na tshad med par rtog par byed na/ gzugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des mtshan thog thag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong ngo // mtshan
355b2(mdo sde): gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba mthong ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjes su bltas nas/ gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do// tad+ya thA/ bidz+ra ma b+ha/ bidz+ra ma b+ha/ ud bA da bya ya/ bidz+ra ma b+ha/ a nu
355b3(mdo sde): na ta thA tA/ b+hu ti ko Ti/ bidz+nyA ma b+ha swA hA/ ji srid du des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par spel nas/ de nas byung ste rang gi mgo'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i yod
355b4(mdo sde): kyis rjes su bltas nas/ tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya/ ming dngang bar bya'o// rang gi lus la mer blta bar bya ste/ ji ltar zhe na/ des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang / zhing lag thams
355b5(mdo sde): cad du 'gro ba mthong nas/ rang gi lus thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/ thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar dang / phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin du mthong ngo zhes
355b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs thams cad du de la gzugs snang ba gang mi 'byung ba 'di ni de'i thams cad sgrub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu su la la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la
355b7(mdo sde): byed pa'i gzungs sngags shin tu bsgoms shing / mchod sbyin legs par byas la/ shin tu yid la byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas/ ma
356a1(mdo sde): lus pa'i bar du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de/
356a2(mdo sde): 'dod na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams cad dang / phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos thams cad dang / rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang / gzhan yang gang dag snyan dngags su byas pa'i
356a3(mdo sde): rnams des the tshom med par shin tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / de nyin mtshan gcig gis bsam gtan bzhi dang / gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
356a4(mdo sde): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom par 'dod na/ des shin tu bsgoms pa yin no// de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi
356a5(mdo sde): 'pho dang / skye ba dang / sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad rang gi lus sam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'am/ brgya byin gyi bar ram/ tshangs pa'i bar
356a6(mdo sde): ram/ sred med kyi bu'i bar ram/ dbang phyug chen po'i bar ram/ rgyal chen bzhi'i bar ram/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bar ram/ chu'i bar ram/ me'i bar ram/ sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed do// de 'dod
356a7(mdo sde): na skad cig gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad me tog gi bar dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang
356b1(mdo sde): rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang bar byed do/ / sus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu shin tu bsgoms pa yin zhing / shin tu 'dris par byas la
356b2(mdo sde): shin tu yid la byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ / de de ltar bsod nams dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang
356b3(mdo sde): rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes pa tshad med par 'gyur ro// des de ltar gang yang rung ba dag yongs su rdzogs par byas na/ myur du 'khor ba las thar par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang
356b4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phag pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de lta yin yang mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa de yang / bdun
356b5(mdo sde): phrag bdun du bzhi par rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom par byed na/ bdun phrag bdun po de 'das nas/ las kyi sgrib pa sum tsham
356b6(mdo sde): zad cing / lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa de lta bu de ni de ltar don che ba yin no// su la la bzhi/
356b7(mdo sde): pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rna lam du thos na/ de la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa'i bar de nye bar brtags nas dang pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog
357a1(mdo sde): tu dga' ba skye'o/ / de btson ra'i 'ching ba dam po las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / sdug bsngal dag las
357a2(mdo sde): yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang / chad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / g.yang sa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dgra thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang
357a3(mdo sde): nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnas kyi 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ bran gyi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar las
357a4(mdo sde): yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// su sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de lta bu thos pa tsam rna lam du grags na/ de la nye bar brtags nas dad pa skyes te/ de ltar don che zhing phan
357a5(mdo sde): yon che ba yin no/ / su ji ltar bstan pa bzhin de bzhin du sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon yongs su spang ba spyad pa/ dkrigs pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
357a6(mdo sde): drug ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob par gyur to// ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon tan de dag dang yang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sdug
357a7(mdo sde): bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / de'i tshe sems can dpa g.yas pa kha cig ni mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu dang po gnas par gyur to// khacig
357b1(mdo sde): ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par gyur to/ / de'i tshe sems can dpag yas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma skyed pa'i sems bskyed do// mun bral ma la sogs pa bdud kyi bu mo//
357b2(mdo sde): lnga brgya po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi ma thus bdud kyi gnas su 'khod bzhin sems yongs su sbyang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad thos so// thos nas kyang bud med kyi
357b3(mdo sde): dngos po mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa nyid thob bo// gang dag sngon yongasu sbyang ba byas pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur to// ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin
357b4(mdo sde): du yon tan de dag dang ldan par gyur to/ / de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ tshangs pa chen po re re yang bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing /
357b5(mdo sde): bye ba brgya phrag mang pos mdun gyis bltas te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas/ de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das
357b6(mdo sde): kyi thad du babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / rin po che dang / ras bcos bu
357b7(mdo sde): dang / chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing / mngon par gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
358a1(mdo sde): tu 'khod do/ / 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i le'u ste dgung rdzogs so// / de/
358a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lag 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhal lta byos shig
358a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dus lags kyis gshegs shig/ bcom ldan 'das gang khyod kyi mdzad pa mdzod gcig/
358a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byang ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no//
358a5(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas/ grul bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / spyad pa dang / gdugs dang /
358a6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char pa dag rab tu 'bebs shing / sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra 'byin la/ mi dang mi ma yin pa thamacad kyis bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis bstod nas/ bcom ldan
358a7(mdo sde): 'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang / gang bcom ldan
358b1(mdo sde): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te/ ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'ang bzhed par shes so// de ltar rig nas ma
358b2(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog bkram pa'i them skas sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol
358b3(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis the ma skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi them skas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i
358b4(mdo sde): phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas rnams las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu 'phrul dgas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi
358b5(mdo sde): gser gyi them skas tsan dan sa mchog sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis bcom
358b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai DUR+Ya'i them skas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan bye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs
358b7(mdo sde): par gsol/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi bai DUR+Ya'i them skas/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
359a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mu tig dmar po'i them
359a2(mdo sde): skas lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las
359a3(mdo sde): gshegs par gsol/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi rin po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyis rab tu khebs/
359a4(mdo sde): paba'i them skas de nyid sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi
359a5(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spug gi them skas lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa de nyid sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol
359a6(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas/ bdag nyid 'dun pas bdag dang 'dra
359a7(mdo sde): ba sangs rgyas kyi sku bdun sprul nas/ sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyis mdun du bdar cing / byang chub sems
359b1(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs so// sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag mchog tu lhan ne lhang nger ri rab
359b2(mdo sde): kyi rtse mor bzhugs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od kyi 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag stong shar ba bzhin no// klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas
359b3(mdo sde): rten du lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ gcig la gcig dris pa/ snang ba chen po'i nang na rten pa ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa brgyad pa de dag ga las
359b4(mdo sde): 'ongs/ dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis kyis smras pa/ ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan cig tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa 'di gnas pa/ kun mchog lha yi dbang phyug shin tu mkhas pa rnams
359b5(mdo sde): kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin/ / bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis longs spyod byed// 'ching ba rnams las thar par byed kyis kun kyang de la mgo bos phyag 'tshol
359b6(mdo sde): cig/ ma dros pas 'di skad ces smras so// de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'gro gtso 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul can// khyed la snying brtse ba yis bu dang skye bos yongs bskor 'di
359b7(mdo sde): na gnas pa yin/ / 'di na gang zhig la la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres shing skom pa'i nad kyis 'jigs// sems can de yang rab tu thar byed khyed cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams
360a1(mdo sde): las thar par byed/ / sa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// de lta ma yin 'di rgyal lnga dbang 'thab bral dga' ldan 'phrul pa gzhan 'phrul pa/ de dag
360a2(mdo sde): khyed la snyed brtse ba yis ri la gnas shing klu yi tshogs la lta/ / bdag cag yongs su skyobs zhes kun gyis gsang mthor de dag la ni 'o dod 'bod// de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan pas
360a3(mdo sde): khyed cag btson ra dag nas zhi bar byed/ / rgya mtshos smras pa/ de dag ma yin 'di ni lha dbang brgya byin tshogs bcas gzi brjid lhung nge ba// de ni gling bzhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su
360a4(mdo sde): yod brtse ba'i yid kyis lta/ / khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i yid du gyis la khro ba myur du dor bar gyis// de yis myur da lag 'gro thar byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun las thar par byed//
360a5(mdo sde): shin tu brtan gyis smras pa/ de lta ma yin 'di kun gzugs rten lha tshogs bsam gtan bde ldan gzi brjid can// sems can rnams kyi chad du drang srong 'dir 'dzegs 'khod nas
360a6(mdo sde): brtse bas phyogs rnams su/ / myur du srog chags rnams kyi 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i char pa 'bebs// lha yi yid kyis thams cad de la phyag 'tshol 'di nas bdag cag
360a7(mdo sde): thar par byed/ / klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smraso// 'di ni gzugs na rten pa'i lha min bzhi po 'di kun bdud kyi 'byor pa yin// lus ngan skyes mchog bdud
360b1(mdo sde): rtsi'i skom dang rgyu bar btags pa 'di dag gnas pa ni/ / gnod sbyin sde dang bcas pas yongs bskor phyogs bzhi skyong byed sdig pa'i skye bo grel// de dag gis ni bdag cag sems
360b2(mdo sde): zhan mthong na 'di nas myur du thar par byed/ / klu rin chen skyong gi so 'di skad ces smras so// de dag ma yin de na mgo bregs du re smrig gos can 'khod par snang ba yin// de dag la
360b3(mdo sde): ni kun lta thal mo sbyar 'khod skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin/ / bdun po de dag cher bsgrubs brtul zhugs brtan pa mgo bregs bdag gis mthong ba yin// dur smrig gos bgros
360b4(mdo sde): mtshan gyis rab brgyan 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os par mthong / / klu lus 'a bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ni bdag nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten 'dren/
360b5(mdo sde): pa yin te nga la de ltar snang // sems can rnams kyi mnyam gnyen 'gro ba skyob pa sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sel byed pa// gang dag lhan cig snang ba drang srong gzhan rnams kyang na de yis sprul
360b6(mdo sde): pa yin/ / bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir nas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ rI rab dpag
360b7(mdo sde): tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'khor brgya stong yod par gyur to/ / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna
361a1(mdo sde): bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'og min gyi lnga'i gnas la thug pa'i bar man chad/ sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar spras pa/
361a2(mdo sde): de srid cig sprul te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / spyad pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
361a3(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par sprul pa yin no// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bos te
361a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni nga dang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
361a5(mdo sde): drang srong rnams dang / bdud rnams dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to//
361a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du da ltar ri rab 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis shin tu longs spyad zin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' semasad pa' chen po
361a7(mdo sde): dedag dang / lha dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to// ri rab kyi rtse mon gnas pa'i 'byung ba khyed la phan pa dang / bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan
361b1(mdo sde): 'das gal te bdag cag la thugs brtse bar mdzad na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / ra rab longs spad
361b2(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na gral te yang gang su dag bdud dam/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po
361b3(mdo sde): 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ lte'i phye chen po'i
361b4(mdo sde): dbang po 'am/ sems can dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa lha'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas/ mi'i drang srong gi bar de dag thams cad 'dir lhags par gyur na/ 'dir bdag
361b5(mdo sde): cag la shas cher phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so// der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ de'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer// kha dog sngon pa dang / ser po dang
361b6(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo // 'od zer de dag gshegs nas/ bdud kyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang / brgya byin gyi gnas
361b7(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / drang srong gnas bye ba phrag brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi
362a1(mdo sde): zhing 'di ji snyed pa thams cad du 'od zer de dag zhugs so/ / ded de dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags pa bdud dam zhes bya ba nas/
362a2(mdo sde): drang srong rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du ming du btags pa de dang / de dag thams cad la rab tu go bar mdzad nas/ bdud ces bya ba nas/ drang srong zhes bya ba'i bar de dang / de dag
362a3(mdo sde): de nas chas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku brgyad po dri dag ga la bar skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis/ 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor 'khod do// bcom ldan
362a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis sprul pa dag rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyi nang na/ ri rab 'di ni mchog
362a5(mdo sde): dang / phul yin par nges bshad de/ ri rab 'di ni 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis longs spyod pa yin zhing / ri rab thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no// de thos nas brgya byin ko'u shi ka dang
362a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i bar mchog tu yid bde ba dang rangs pa skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag drang srong
362a7(mdo sde): pa'i gnas rten de nas dong ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ni 'di nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug mas 'dug nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'ad
362b1(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig lnga lta'o zhes bya ba nas/ klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ni byang phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i
362b2(mdo sde): pabar dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa ni shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug ma bzhag nas zhes bya ba nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhug ste/ bcom ldan 'das
362b3(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa de dag ni/ de nas 'dong bar ma nus so// de dag thams cad kyis gsang bstod de 'di skad
362b4(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / btson ra 'di nas bdag cag yongs su bsgrub par gsol/ yongs su thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis/ bcom ldan
362b5(mdo sde): 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo nas 'dir gshegs shing / gnas rten 'dir bzhugs nas/ klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de dag gnyis klas gnas rten nas/
362b6(mdo sde): ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de srid kyi rang gi lus sprul to// de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ klu de dag ni lus rtsub cing 'dus te reg pa gdug pa yin pas/ bcom ldan
362b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil dag ral bar gyur ni mi rung ngo snyam nas/ des lag 'gro'i lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yongs su g.yogs shing / mgo la yang tsan dan
363a1(mdo sde): sbrul gyi snying po dang / ta ma la'i lo mas phye ma'i yongs su g.yogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dag mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang
363a2(mdo sde): srong thub pa'i gnas rten de/ rgyar dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sprul to// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbus su lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i ras bcwo
363a3(mdo sde): bu dang / rgyan dang / nor bu dang / rin po che rnams kyi gdan dag bting ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas/ kun shes ko'u di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ tswi nas
363a4(mdo sde): kyang spangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis thos par de la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs de lta bus chos ston te/ ko'u dri n+ya
363a5(mdo sde): gang mig gi skye ba dang / / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o// 'di ni nad dang / srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi
363a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'o/ / 'di ni rga shri'i 'byung ba'o// ko'u di n+ya gang rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / nye bAr len pa
363a7(mdo sde): la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o/ / 'di ni nad dang srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o// 'di ni rga shi'i 'byung ba'o// ko'i di n+ya gang mig gi 'gog
363b1(mdo sde): pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / nub pa dang / nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'di nA/
363b2(mdo sde): rga shi'i nub pa'o// ko'u di n+ya gang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'gog pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / nub pa dang / nye bar len pa'i rnam par zhi
363b3(mdo sde): ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o/ / 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o// chos gang gis nga lha dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang
363b4(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na/ phul yin par grag pa dang / byam pa chen pos mchog yin par grag pa dang / snying rje chen
363b5(mdo sde): blo dam pa yin par grag pa dang / 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med par grag pa dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par grags pa
363b6(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos de ni
363b7(mdo sde): ngas sems can thams cad la rgya cher bstan to/ / gsal bar mdzad do// ston pa thugs brtse ba can/ phan par bzhed pas gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad pa ni ngas mdzad zan
364a1(mdo sde): te/ da khyed cag gis bya ba yin no// rga shi'i mthar dbyung ba'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang / shing drung dang / dur khrod dang / ri dang / ri khrod dang / bas/
364a2(mdo sde): mtha'i gnas mal de dag tu phyis 'gyod pa can gyur na mi rung gis sgoms shig/ rtsol cig/ nges kyis rje su bstun pa ni 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grang
364a3(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad du gleng bzhi pa re rer yang / sems can dkrigs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po
364a4(mdo sde): de dag gis ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed do// kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa rnams la gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig
364a5(mdo sde): bskyed do/ / kha cig ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams byang ngo zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig ni semA can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i bar dang / kha cig ni gnod spyan dbul po nyid kyi bar dang /
364a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni mi dbul po nyid du 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su byang ngo // nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to// sems can rnams btson ra nas yongs su thar par gyur to// de nas
364a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dge ba sna tshogs dri ma med pa'i gsar can spyod pa rnam dag thugs rjes phyug/ lha dang shed las skyes dang lag 'gro'i
364b1(mdo sde): dam pa nyon mongs rnyog pa sel mdzad pa/ tshul khrims thos rig gsum po phun sum tshogs pa sems can thams cad 'dzud pa po// lag 'gro'i tshegs rab thar mdzad thugs rjes brtan po sngon
364b2(mdo sde): gyi dam bcas dgongs par mdzod/ / gzhan sems sems can slad du sdug bsngal ji ltar bdang ba bzhin// lag 'gro skad cig mtha' yas 'dir rmongs sdug bsngal sna tshogs thebs//
364b3(mdo sde): dgra yis phyag bgyis brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las grol ba// ye shes chab kyis lag 'gro thams cad tshim par mdzad du gsol// 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo
364b4(mdo sde): nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ ri rab la gshegs pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// // 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde/ nyi ma'i snying po zhes
364b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i mdo/ / // bam po bcu gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / rin po che dang / chos gos dag gi char rab tu 'bebs
364b6(mdo sde): shid sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin thams cad sdud pas ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan tho
364b7(mdo sde): kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi yongasu bskor nas/ drang srong thub pa'i gan rten gyi dbu su gdan bting ba 'dadi la bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i
365a1(mdo sde): phyir/ steng gi nam mkha' la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin drang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyis rgyan dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs
365a2(mdo sde): dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo/ / bcom ldan 'das la klu de dag gis kyang me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / ras gos dang ras
365a3(mdo sde): bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
365a4(mdo sde): spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sug las gang dag gis//
365a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams klu'i skye gnas su skye lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po las kyi sgrib pa bcus sems can 'byung po rnams myur du klu'i skye gan su skye'o//
365a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing / bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag yin la/ myur du 'dod pa rnam
365a7(mdo sde): la nyes dmigs su lta ba ma yin zhing / shin tu sbyin pa la mngon par brtson la/ lag brkyang bdag yod de/ de dag smon lam gyi dbang gis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems
365b1(mdo sde): can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/ de dag gis tshul khrims thams cad rdzogs
365b2(mdo sde): pabar skyon med par srung ba ni ma nus so/ / de dag sems can dpral ba dang / yi dogs kyi 'jigs pas skrag nas/ rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems cani
365b3(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol bar byed cing / shin tu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dag yod de/ de dag nga rgyal gyi mthus rang gi smon lam gyi klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems
365b4(mdo sde): can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa'i spyod pa'i mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/ de dag shin tu khro ba mang zhing sems can rnams la rab tu sdang ste/ de dag shA khe na la brten pas 'chi/
365b5(mdo sde): ba'i dus tha mar klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te/ de dag smon lam gyis der skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang yang dag par ldan zhing / snod du gyur pa'i
365b6(mdo sde): sbyin gnas yongs su btsal ba dang / mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag ser sna can dang
365b7(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyi sgron dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal la mngon par dga' zhing / mu cor smra la rdzun du smra ba dag yod
366a1(mdo sde): de/ de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang bdag yin zhing / chos dang / dge
366a2(mdo sde): 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu dang / pha ma rnams la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag yin pa yod de// de'i tshe
366a3(mdo sde): de dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yad chung ngus 'khrul pas klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non cing
366a4(mdo sde): ma dul la skyon med pa ma yin par spyod pa dag yod de/ de dag klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang / phra ma smra ba dang / tshig rtsub po smra ba la goms pa dag yo
366a5(mdo sde): de/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nasra/ klu rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ bcu po de dag yin no// chos gzhan gsum dang ldan na klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// gsum gang zhe na/ sems can gang
366a6(mdo sde): ngag lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa shin tu dam po dag gis sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag yod de/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas/
366a7(mdo sde): nyes par spyod pa'i lhag ma chung ngus klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang / de bzhin du yi dgas rnams nas zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis
366b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ / rgya mtshos yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ btsun pa bcom
366b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di na klu gang dag longs spod dang / nye bar spyod pa'i dpal dang ldan pa/ lha dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa nas/ mi smad rams dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang / yi dag
366b3(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang / gang dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar nas/ klu gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra ba dag gis par mchis lags te
366b4(mdo sde): de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba lags so/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po pad+ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag sug las gang gis klu'i rigs su skyes nas
366b5(mdo sde): gzugs mchog tu lham me zhing / / lus kyis reg pa gang cung zad ci reg kyang / gang kun tu tshig cing 'bar ba lags/ bdag dus thams cad du mchis nas mal bor nas/ gcer
366b6(mdo sde): bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/ bdag gi pha ma de ni dpal phun sum tshogs pa/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa myong ste/ dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags/ bcom
366b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lag 'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas
367a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / / de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po me tog bral des kyang
367a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad phul nas/ rtag
367a3(mdo sde): tu chos mnyan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so//
367a4(mdo sde): rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srad sgrub bcas zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de rjes
367a5(mdo sde): su skong zhing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang / de na gang dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha la longs spyod par byed pa thams
367a6(mdo sde): cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de drag kyang gnas de nas dong ngo // de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas
367a7(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyod par mi byed/ gzhan la yang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du
367b1(mdo sde): skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas btsos so// de de nas shi 'phos nas yi dgas rnams kyi nang
367b2(mdo sde): du skyes te/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por de sdug bsngal myong ngo // phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo // lag 'gro 'khor bas skrag
367b3(mdo sde): po'i sems dang ldan pa srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba rab tu byung ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas/ de ltar yun ring por ngan song du sdug bsngal myong ba de gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na/
367b4(mdo sde): gzhan yin par yang blta bar mi bya ste/ de ltar las kyi slob pa dam pos zin pa yang khyod yin no// 'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan song gsum gyi nang
367b5(mdo sde): du skyes so/ / de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo // gang khyod 'di nasra shi
367b6(mdo sde): 'phos nas/ phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar gyur pa 'di na gnas yod do// klu'i bu de mchog tu yid mi
367b7(mdo sde): dga' nas/ rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang / myos pa ji ltar
368a1(mdo sde): dang / migs la pa dang / mai snrukhas pa'i sgru ba badzin du nongs pasdu sor 'jugs lags so// ngas pa smo sar 'jugs lags so// btsun pab la
368a2(mdo sde): 'das bdag gis bsam pas sdom pa gzung bar bgyi'o/ / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spang bar bgyi lags so//
368a3(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod lhag pa'i bsam pas nga la skya
368a4(mdo sde): su song bas khyod kyi ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su zad do/ / 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te/ byams pa'i thad du rab tu 'byung
368a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams
368a6(mdo sde): cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems
368a7(mdo sde): na/ de bzhin yin par yang mi blta ste/ de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no// 'di ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror ma skyes so// lha'i dpal dang / ska
368b1(mdo sde): ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya chen po myong ngo / / 'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ 'dir dpal dang skal
368b2(mdo sde): ba bzang po de lta bu myong ngo / / de skad ces thos nas/ klu thams cad skyo zhing mchog tu yid mi dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtogs pas gtse
368b3(mdo sde): par byed par gyur to/ / de'i nang na klu gzhan mig med pa/ long ba 'bras bu nyam chung ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des gsang bstod nas 'o dod bos te gsol pa/ sems can
368b4(mdo sde): rnams la thugs brtse ba dag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ / yun rang bdag gi lus la sdug bsngal tsher ba rab mi bzad// srin bu sbal pa skye bo srog chags sna tshogs 'tshal
368b5(mdo sde): bar bgyid/ / bza' ba btung ba ma mchis chab tshan nang na bdag gnas lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba 'jig rgyal bstan pa la// sngon ni dge sbyong khyod
368b6(mdo sde): gyur te/ / mkhas shing gtsang sbra spyod lam ldan// dben pa dag tu'ang sdig pa byed// lhan cig gnas pa dag kyang mang // khyod bdag ston pa 'dra bar gyur// dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen po
368b7(mdo sde): yang / khyod la slob ma rnams kyis brjod// rnyed dang bkur sti byung ba ni// khyod gcig pu yis longs spyad cing // khyod kyis dge slong nges pa mthong // de dag la ni mi snyan
369a1(mdo sde): brjod/ / lhan cig gnas de mi dgar gnas// khyod ni tshe rabs stong dag tu// nged kyi zas su gyur cig ces// de lta bu yi sems bskyed de// las kyi rnam
369a2(mdo sde): par smin pa des/ / 'dir yang khyod ni lag 'gror skyes// khyed rang gi yang lhan cig gnas// phyi phyir za bar byed pa yin// chu tshan nang na gnas pa dang // long bar de yis gyur/
369a3(mdo sde): pa yin// kun tu 'bar ba'i lcags dang zangs// phyis kyang dmyal bar za bar 'gyur// stobs med yid ni mi dga' bas// klu dbang kun gyi nang na du// nyes pa so sor bshags/
369a4(mdo sde): byas na// sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su grol// de nas bcom ldan gser 'dra ba'i// phyag gis de bzhin dkyil 'khor reg/ spyod par dka' ba dgongs mdzad nas// ston pas
369a5(mdo sde): 'di skad bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po mig bzang snang byung ste// sngon tshe bden pa gang gi sangs// bram ze long ba'i don du ni// mig dag gnyis ka phyung bar gyur// bden pa'i tshig dri'o
369a6(mdo sde): na yis/ / khyod kyis dri med mig thob shog/ nga yi legs par spyod pas khyod// sngon gyi las de byang bar shog/ tad+ya thA/ tsak+Shu kha bA ra san kha ba/ karma kha ba/ a nan dza na/ brir
369a7(mdo sde): dza/ prAn ta/ dzA ma/ ni sa ra Na to ya/ a he tsan dra Da ne tI bi shud d+he/ pa li shud d+he/ a dze ta dze ta le/ tan ta laM/ ba se d+ha sa ke/ bas te/ ru ra ti/ ma hA nAnur bi/
369b1(mdo sde): tri rat+na pra te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i tshig de bshad pa na/ klu 'bras bu nyam chung ba'i mig yongs su dag par gyur to// klu gzhan stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum/
369b2(mdo sde): gyi mig kyang yongs su dag par gyur to// gzhan gnod sbyin dang / gral bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / mi khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa zad
369b3(mdo sde): cing / mig yongs su dag par gyur to// de nas lho'i bu mtshan bzangs thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas smras pa/ 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs la ltos// rab tu
369b4(mdo sde): lam med rnams la mig kyang byin/ / gal te ston pa 'jig rten mi 'byung na// su yang 'gro bar sho'i mig phyis mi mthong // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
369b5(mdo sde): ko'u di n+yal bka' stsal pa/ ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis gsang sngags chen po'i gzhi'i gzungs sngags mig sgrub pa 'di zung zhig/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la la sems can
369b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi lhag ma dang / khams kun tu 'khrugs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang / dug gi sbyor bas long bar 'gyur ba dang / cung zad mthong bar yang
369b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba des mig sgrub pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rang gis bklag par bya'o/ / rang gi las so sor bshags par bya'o// des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis sangs
370a1(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing / las gzhan mi byed par zhag bdun phrag bdun du rang gi mig la bya bas na mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// yang
370a2(mdo sde): sems can gang dag mtshams med pa'i las lhag ma lus pas long bar gyur cing / / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i lhag ma lus pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang /
370a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / glegs bam du bris pa rnam par 'jig pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / gzhan gyi mig rnam par 'jig pa'i las kyi lhag mas long bar
370a4(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag gis gzungs sngags de dag yi ge 'drir bcug ste/ yang dang yang du klog tu gzhug go// las kyi sgrib pa bshags par bya'o// gzhan yang rgya mtsho'i dbu pa dang / shing
370a5(mdo sde): / drar dang / sman kA tsa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ru sa sbal gyi snying rnyil ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btags shing btsos la/ gsang sngags 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyad mngon par brjod
370a6(mdo sde): cing mig gi phyi rol bsku bar bya'o/ / zhag bdun phrag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / sangs rgyas sku gzugs kyang byas na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa mA lus
370a7(mdo sde): par byang bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mig yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyi gnas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas na yang / de'i las kyi sgrib pa
370b1(mdo sde): / byang bar 'gyur ro// phyis kyang 'khor bar mig ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor des 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
370b2(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sems can thams can la phan par mdzad pa/ nad las rab tu thar par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de'i tshe klu tshon rtse sngon rdzogasang ba
370b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba khyod// khyod ni dga' mdzad dpal kun ldan// khyod kyis las kyang rab tu mkhyen// srog chags kun gyi rgyal po khyed//
370b4(mdo sde): bdag ni chu dang rnam bral zhing // tsha ba'i rlung gso dgun gdungs pa'i// 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa lags// dri mi zhim pa'i gnas na gnas// lo ni bye ba phrag stong du//
370b5(mdo sde): zhag gcig bdag la bde ma mchis// rtag par 'khor dang lhan cig tu// bdag ni gzhan gyis bza' ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems
370b6(mdo sde): can gang dag sdig byas nas/ / phyis kyang bdag nyid bsod nams sgrub// lus kyi gaN+DI brdungs nas su// dge slong dge 'dun tshim byed na'ang / las kyi lhag ma de yis su// /
370b7(mdo sde): gang dang gang du skyes par ni// sdug bsngal ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur zhing // bza' btung dag dang yang dag ldan// yang na klu yi skye gnas su// las kyis skye bar 'gyur ba yin//
371a1(mdo sde): de yi mgo yi klad pa der// nor bu'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur// kun tu chu 'byung zhes bya ba// chu sbyin byed pa'i klur 'gyur ro// gang na klu ni gnas
371a2(mdo sde): byed pa/ / de nas chu ni 'bab par 'gyur// sa 'amu nam mkha' la yang rung // grang dang gang du 'gro ba der// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba
371a3(mdo sde): yin/ / yang na sems can gang dag gis// mi yi dngos po thob nas su// sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas// dge 'dun rim gro mi byed na// de dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs ni//
371a4(mdo sde): ngan song gsum du myong nas kyang // de nyid klu yi skye gnas su// skye ba thob par 'gyur ba yin// de nas kun tu chu mi 'byung // mgo la nor bu rin chen med// stong pa skam pa'i
371a5(mdo sde): gnas dag tu/ / chu med par ni gnas par 'gyur// sngon 'das dus na khyod kyis ni// rgyal ba skar rgyal bstan pa la// dge slong dgon pa par gyur te// phrag deg ser snas
371a6(mdo sde): gang ba yin/ / dge slong glo bur 'ongs mthong na// khro gnyer can gyi bzhin byas nas// de dag la ni sbyin gtong byed// de la yang ni mngon sum gshe/ drer ni gang dag chur yang
371a7(mdo sde): myur du mi gtsang ba yis bkang / / 'chags sa gnas khang dag gi gnas// dri nga ba yis bkang bar gyuraro// dge slong nges pa 'gro ba na// brgyad bkag gis ni gshe bar gyur//
371b1(mdo sde): dge slong nges pa gzhan dag kyang // rgyang ring bar ni yongs su spangs// de phyir phrag dog ser sna'i rgyus// mchod par ni khyod gyur nas// dge sbyong su zhig la la mthong //
371b2(mdo sde): myur du khros nas gshe bar gyur// sbyin pa po la khro bas gshe// ngo tsha khrel yod rnam par spangs// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sems can dmyal bar so sor skyes//
371b3(mdo sde): khris ni bye bas sems dmyal du// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // yi dgas rnams su dus ring por// sdug bsngal rab tu mi bzad myong // khyod ni klu yi skye gnas su// skyes
371b4(mdo sde): nas shin tu sdug bsngal gyur/ / stong pa 'brog dgon rdzong rnams su// chu dang bral bar gnas pa yis// sems can dmyal ba rnams su khyod// sdug bsngal tshor ba phyir phyir myong //
371b5(mdo sde): shin tu yun ring yi dgas dang // dud 'gror sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // su zhig tha ma 'chi tshe gnod sems byung // rtag tu phrag dog ser sna khros pa la// bsam gtan mi
371b6(mdo sde): skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min/ / tshul khrims mi skyob dgon par gnas pa min// yang de'i tshe klu'i 'khor de'i nang nas/ klu yi dgas lta bu bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa drug sngon gyi
371b7(mdo sde): tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ skad po cher rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag
372a1(mdo sde): cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bstan pa la bdag cag gis 'dra mtshungs par las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu 'phangs lags so// de ltar yun
372a2(mdo sde): ring por dran song gsum du sdug bsngal myong lags so/ / da ltar yang klu yi dgas lta bu rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir lags te/ dper na klu yi dgas
372a3(mdo sde): lta bu tshon rtsi sngon po bzhin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis tshu long la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chag chag thob cig dang / de nas khyed kyi
372a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ / klu yi dgas lta bu de dag thams cad kyis lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs pa dang / lag na chu 'dug pa de rab tu 'bar ro// de nas
372a5(mdo sde): mi'i phung po shing ta la drug srid du 'phags te/ lan bdun gyi bar du de bzhin no// klu'i tshogs de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas/ mchi ma dag byung ngo // thams cad dang ldan pa'i
372a6(mdo sde): 'khor de yang yid kun tu mi dga' nas de bzhin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa// de 'dra ba yI 'bras bu thob// dge ba yin na bzang
372a7(mdo sde): po ste/ sdig pa byed pa'ang sdig to'o// de nas yi dgas lta bu'i klu// khyed kun 'di skad tshig smos shig/ bden pa gang gis ston pa ni// sems can kun la thugs snyom pa//
372b1(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis// nged kyi chu na ma 'bar zhig/ klu thams cad kyis de skad ces smras so// lan brgyad pa lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab
372b2(mdo sde): gnyis la gtor nas/ nyes pa la nyes pa so sor bshags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa'i las kyi sgrub pa ya// lhag ma lus pa yongs su zad// byams
372b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshe na khyed cag ni/ / mi yi srid pa thob par 'gyur// byams pa yi ni bstan pa la// myur du rab tu 'byung ba 'thob// rnal 'byor la ni mngon brtson dang // myur du dgra bcom
372b4(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur/ / yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i tshogs de ji ltar lhags pa bzhin/ de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dang / badragi gis las dang
372b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang skye ba rjes su dran te/ 'khor de'i nang nas klu brgya stong phrag mang po rang gis nyes pa byas pa'i sdig pa'i las kyis rab tu ngus nas/ kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol te/
372b6(mdo sde): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa la bdag cag khyim na gnas par gyur te/ nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang / chos mnyan pa'i rkyen kyis dge slong rnams dang lhan cig
372b7(mdo sde): tu dge 'dun gyi sngon du gyur pa/ bsngos pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khu ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba longs spyad lags so zhes bya ba nas/ kha cigagis gsol pa/
373a1(mdo sde): bdag cag gis phyogs bzhi pa la bsngos pa longs spyad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis ma
373a2(mdo sde): longasra spyad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi zhes bya ba'i bA ra dang / bdag cag gtsug tor can zhe
373a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar dang / bdag cag 'khor ba 'jig gi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bdag cag gser thub kyi zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// klu kha cig gis ni 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin ga
373a4(mdo sde): pa 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la bdag cag khyim na gnas par gyur te/ nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang / chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis de bzhin du bsngos pa'i dge 'dun gyi me tog dang / 'bras
373a5(mdo sde): bu dang / khu ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dge slong rnams la stsal ba de bdag cag gi longs spyad lags so// sdig pa'i las des kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du sdug
373a6(mdo sde): bsngal mi bzad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu mi bzad pa mang po yang dang yang nyams su myong lags so/ / dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi nang du dus yun ring por rtag tu sdug
373a7(mdo sde): bsngal gyis gzir lags so/ / las kyi lhag ma des bdag cag klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes nas/ tsha ba bskol ba kun tu tsha ba'i nang du btsos legs so// bye ma kun tu tsha ba'i
373b1(mdo sde): / nang du bsregs lags so// bud ga cag gi kha'i sgor kha zas stsal pa yang lcags kyi thu lum du gyur lags so// de bzhin du khar btung ba stsal ba yang lcags dang zangs su gyur
373b2(mdo sde): lags so/ / gang dang gang du mchis pa thams cad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myed lags na/ bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
373b3(mdo sde): kye lag 'gro dag khyed kyis dge 'dun gyi longs sprad pa de ni 'os pa ma yin te/ mtshams med pa dang nye ba yin no// rnam par ma smin par gang gis kyang myur du bshags par mi nus
373b4(mdo sde): se/ kye lag 'gro dag de lta yin yang ji srid 'tshe'i bar du skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la 'khod cig dang / de lta na khyed la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// rgyu des de bzhin gshegs
373b5(mdo sde): pas khyed 'dod pa bzhin 'khor bar gzhog par mdzad do/ / de dag thams cad gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la yang bkod par gyur to// yang 'khor de'i nang na klu mo long ma zhig
373b6(mdo sde): yod de/ de'i kha srin bus gang zhing gcin rul ba lta bu'i rnag dri nga ba zag pa// smad kyi mtshan la yang de bzhin no// de'i lus thams cad rul cing rnag 'dzag pa/ phol mig
373b7(mdo sde): dang srin bus gang ba la/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kyis za bar byed do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos gzigs te
374a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sring mo khyod kyis lus la sdig pa'i las ni ci byas ji lta bu zhig/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis tshor ba sdug bsngal
374a2(mdo sde): ba lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshor ba tsha ba lags te/ gang nas klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes pa'i dgung lo stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug bdag gis mngon pa
374a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lags so/ / bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu ni gdugs zhag gcig kyang rgyun ma chad lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi las ci zhig byas/ des gsol pa/
374a4(mdo sde): 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/ rgyal ba rnam par gzigs kyi bstan pa la/ mi'i rgyud kyi bud med du gyur lags te/ bdag der 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos nas/
374a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang lhan cig tu/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang na/ dge 'dun gyi mal cha'i steng du yang dang yang du 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i ches 'dod
374a6(mdo sde): padang so sor yang dag par myong lags te/ nor gyi slad du mi skrag lags so// bcom ldan 'das de tshun chad bdag gtan du lha dang mI'i rnyed pa dang bral lags so// rtag tu ngan song
374a7(mdo sde): gsum gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa rab tu mi bzad pas gzir lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ sring mo gang gi tshe 'dir bskal pa chen po 'jig par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod gang du song / des
374b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ sngon gyi las la rten pa'i rlung chen po de dag gis 'phangs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gzhan dag tu 'phangs lags so// yang gang gi tshe der 'jig
374b2(mdo sde): par gyur nas/ de nas yang 'dir 'phongs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol
374b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gnyis kas ma rtsi smos dang sbyar ba'i chu bzhes te/ bden pa brjod par mdzad do// bden pa gang gis sngon thi ba'i phyir nga'i lus chags pa med par yod
374b4(mdo sde): su btang ba'i bden pa des khyod kyi nad de dag zhi bar gyur cig/ klu mo de'i khar blugs shing lus la gtor bas/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ gsum la skyabs su nye bar gnas
374b5(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / yang de nyid na klu gzhan zhig lus dri nga zhing srin bus gang la srin bu ser skyas gang nas/ de las rnag khrag tsha zhing / gor gor por zag pa/ smra mi nus pa/ mchog
